name: Bekfast Duck
description:
This game is about playing as a duck, stealing bread and killing a king...

Hold up!

I'm not lying about that however it's more than those 3 things. It's also a 2d platformer,  bird simulator and a starve an entire population of geese for taking your bekfast puffs away. If you decide to play this short game just remember to DUCK and not goose ok?

Edit: I've just updated the game so you can now finish it and I might make it so you can play on mobile too. 

Also I do plan on making most of my games later on free but if I make a huge game (like an RPG) it would probably be around $1.
